content.description:
The "Trogdo" dyno is a HUGE dyno in the "Nostril Cave" starting at an obvious start hold travel eight feet out and three feet up to the lip at an angle of more than seventy-five degrees grabbing a good horn with the right hand and a sloper with the left, then hold on.  The topout is a formality. 

  This dyno includes a tremendous swing and is hard on the hands if you don't have it dialed, but it's still one of the funnest dynos in the midwest.  A definite must do for the area.   

  How do you grade a dyno?
content.protection: For this dyno, you will need a few pads and one spotter...the more pads the better.

content.description:
Sit start at the bottom of the cave between Trogdor and The Cheat using a large undercling as your start hold. Climb straight up using cool footwork and  a lot of power. You're going to want to save juice for the last few moves. Finishes with a hard throw out left to the Trogdor finishing horn. 

  Hint: Double knee bar

Low SDS matched on the slope-y horizontal on the left arete of the cave. Thug-y laybacking leads to an inverted finish. Varied climb.Felt harder than the Cheat, but it was also fairly warm for the holds.
content.protection: A pad or two. Annoying rock, but not deadly.

content.description:
"The Cheat" begins on the far right side of the "Nostril Cave" on two pretty decent holds and moves up and right to the lip following somewhat good holds using a few heel hooks, drop-knees, and cross-throughs, as well as a hideous gaston/pinch in the toughest portion and a scarey top-out to boot. 

  See the "Nostril Cave" directions and photos for accessing this particular problem, and look to the beta photo for the top-out location.

The "Nostril Cave" is a larger cave on the Northwest side of Mt. Baldy on the long stretches of granite ramps that work their way down hill.  The cave consists of schist on the bottom portion and granite on the top-out.  The climbing in this cave is burly and very friendly on the hands (minus Trogdor dyno).  An excellent place to escape the heat during the summer!
